name: 3 2 1  Salted Caramel Butter Cake
description:
A simple 3 2 1 version of a Salted Caramel Butter Cake.   
check out
https://www.youtube.com/c/OGADIY
https://www.diyflavorchaser.com/tam-vapes

Have you tried this recipe?!
Please rate this recipe and comment below! I would LOVE to hear your experience.
author: TamVapes

reviews.text: Mixed this one up last night so it's not at the 3 day steep time yet, but I'm already getting a very full and thick cake with a good amount of salted caramel in there. (this is my first mix with VT SC in there and I can definitely say I like it more than FW's version) This tastes really balanced right off the bat, and its a nice simple recipe to try out these new WF extracts, thank you for this! Dessert lovers, don't even question it, just mix it
